00010 /*! \file
00011  *
00012  * \brief SNMP Agent / SubAgent support for Asterisk
00013  *
00014  * \author Thorsten Lockert <tholo@voop.as>
00015  *
00016  * \extref Uses the Net-SNMP libraries available at
00017  *  http://net-snmp.sourceforge.net/
00018  */
00019 
00020 /*** MODULEINFO
00021    <depend>netsnmp</depend>
00022  ***/
00023 
00024 #include "asterisk.h"
00025 
00026 ASTERISK_FILE_VERSION(__FILE__, "$Revision$")
00027 
00028 #include "asterisk/channel.h"
00029 #include "asterisk/module.h"
00030 #include "asterisk/logger.h"
00031 #include "asterisk/options.h"
00032 
00033 #include "snmp/agent.h"
00034 
00035 #define  MODULE_DESCRIPTION   "SNMP [Sub]Agent for Asterisk"
00036 
00037 int res_snmp_agentx_subagent;
00038 int res_snmp_dont_stop;
00039 int res_snmp_enabled;
00040 
00041 static pthread_t thread = AST_PTHREADT_NULL;
00042 
00043 static int load_config(void)
00044 {
00045    struct ast_variable *var;
00046    struct ast_config *cfg;
00047    char *cat;
00048 
00049    res_snmp_enabled = 0;
00050    res_snmp_agentx_subagent = 1;
00051    cfg = ast_config_load("res_snmp.conf");
00052    if (!cfg) {
00053       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Could not load res_snmp.conf\n");
00054       return 0;
00055    }
00056    cat = ast_category_browse(cfg, NULL);
00057    while (cat) {
00058       var = ast_variable_browse(cfg, cat);
00059 
00060       if (strcasecmp(cat, "general") == 0) {
00061          while (var) {
00062             if (strcasecmp(var->name, "subagent") == 0) {
00063                if (ast_true(var->value))
00064                   res_snmp_agentx_subagent = 1;
00065                else if (ast_false(var->value))
00066                   res_snmp_agentx_subagent = 0;
00067                else {
00068                   ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Value '%s' does not evaluate to true or false.\n", var->value);
00069                   ast_config_destroy(cfg);
00070                   return 1;
00071                }
00072             } else if (strcasecmp(var->name, "enabled") == 0) {
00073                res_snmp_enabled = ast_true(var->value);
00074             } else {
00075                ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Unrecognized variable '%s' in category '%s'\n", var->name, cat);
00076                ast_config_destroy(cfg);
00077                return 1;
00078             }
00079             var = var->next;
00080          }
00081       } else {
00082          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Unrecognized category '%s'\n", cat);
00083          ast_config_destroy(cfg);
00084          return 1;
00085       }
00086 
00087       cat = ast_category_browse(cfg, cat);
00088    }
00089    ast_config_destroy(cfg);
00090    return 1;
00091 }
00092 
00093 static int load_module(void)
00094 {
00095    if(!load_config())
00096       return AST_MODULE_LOAD_DECLINE;
00097 
00098    ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_1 "Loading [Sub]Agent Module\n");
00099 
00100    res_snmp_dont_stop = 1;
00101    if (res_snmp_enabled)
00102       return ast_pthread_create_background(&thread, NULL, agent_thread, NULL);
00103    else
00104       return 0;
00105 }
00106 
00107 static int unload_module(void)
00108 {
00109    ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_1 "Unloading [Sub]Agent Module\n");
00110 
00111    res_snmp_dont_stop = 0;
00112    return ((thread != AST_PTHREADT_NULL) ? pthread_join(thread, NULL) : 0);
00113 }
00114 
00115 static int reload(void)
00116 {
00117    ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_1 "Reloading [Sub]Agent Module\n");
00118 
00119    res_snmp_dont_stop = 0;
00120    if (thread != AST_PTHREADT_NULL)
00121       pthread_join(thread, NULL);
00122    thread = AST_PTHREADT_NULL;
00123    load_config();
00124 
00125    res_snmp_dont_stop = 1;
00126    if (res_snmp_enabled)
00127       return ast_pthread_create_background(&thread, NULL, agent_thread, NULL);
00128    else
00129       return 0;
00130 }
00131 
00132 AST_MODULE_INFO(ASTERISK_GPL_KEY, AST_MODFLAG_GLOBAL_SYMBOLS, "SNMP [Sub]Agent for Asterisk",
00133       .load = load_module,
00134       .unload = unload_module,
00135       .reload = reload,
00136       );
